metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000039 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In MuPDF 1.12.0 and earlier, multiple heap use after free bugs in the PDFparser could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code, read memory, orcause a denial of service via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
